name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-tab-personal-razor-csharp
title: Personal tabs in ASP.NET Core with Razor
shortDescription: In this quickstart we'll walk-through creating a custom channel/group tab with ASP.Net Core and Razor. We'll also use App Studio for Microsoft Teams to finalize your app manifest and deploy your tab to Teams.
longDescription: In this quickstart we'll walk-through creating a custom channel/group tab with ASP.Net Core and Razor. We'll also use App Studio for Microsoft Teams to finalize your app manifest and deploy your tab to Teams.
